description:
There was an erroneous reference to 'instane' instead of 'instance' in the code block that builds a libvirt block device for configdrive.

Also, the configdrive block of get_guest_storage_config in nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py has no unit test coverage.
title: libvirt: 'instane' typo while adding configdrive

comments.content: get_guest_storage_config has no unit test coverage nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py that let a typo fixed in https://review.openstack.org/#/c/20044 go unnoticed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mjfork

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/20058
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

commit 9860891a09eb58adadbd519644906e1c6215bf3b
Author: Michael J Fork <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Jan 18 19:03:45 2013 +0000

    libvirt: Fix typo in configdrive implementation
    
    libvirt configdrive implementation
    references 'instane' instead of 'instance'.
    Also, add a test for adding configdrive block device
    that would catch such an error
    
    fixes bug 1101352
